video.title: Cobra Kai
video.synopsis: Decades after the tournament that changed their lives, the rivalry between Johnny and Daniel reignites in this sequel to the "Karate Kid" films.

episodes.synopsis: Drinking hard and living in the shadow of his successful former rival, Daniel, Johnny hits rock bottom and decides to reopen the Cobra Kai karate dojo.
episodes.title: Ace Degenerate

episodes.synopsis: Daniel is rattled when he spots the new Cobra Kai dojo. Later, he learns about a violent altercation from Samâ€™s crush, Kyler.
episodes.title: Strike First

episodes.synopsis: Daniel volunteers to chaperone the Halloween dance so he can keep an eye on Sam. Johnny tries to recruit more students for his new business.
episodes.title: Esqueleto

episodes.synopsis: One of Daniel's billboards is defaced. Miguel's mother forbids him from continuing karate lessons. Johnny learns that Robby's been skipping school.
episodes.title: Cobra Kai Never Dies

episodes.synopsis: Cobra Kai gets its second student. Daniel comes up with a plan to get payback on Johnny. When Kyler betrays Sam, Miguel stands up for her at school.
episodes.title: Counterbalance

episodes.synopsis: Enrollment surges at Cobra Kai thanks to Miguel's fight, but Johnny alienates his students. To hurt his father, Robby gets a job working for Daniel.
episodes.title: Quiver

episodes.synopsis: Johnny must persuade a tournament committee to reverse its lifetime ban on Cobra Kai â€” but Daniel's a member. Miguel and Sam go on a date.
episodes.title: All Valley

episodes.synopsis: As Johnny prepares his students for the All Valley Tournament, Daniel starts training Robby in Miyagi-Do, still unaware that his pupil is Johnny's son.
episodes.title: Molting

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected day of reminiscing results when Johnny confronts Daniel about his car. The Cobra Kai students plot revenge on the popular kids.
episodes.title: Different But Same

episodes.synopsis: As the day of the tournament dawns, Johnny teaches his pupils the third rule of Cobra Kai: no mercy. A familiar face from the past returns.
episodes.title: Mercy

episodes.synopsis: Despite Cobra Kai's victory, Johnny wants to take his dojo in a new direction. Daniel opens his own school with two students: Sam and Robby.
episodes.title: Mercy, Part II

episodes.synopsis: Daniel helps Sam and Robby find balance while leading a sales push at work. Johnny impresses Kreese with a creative but risky training technique.
episodes.title: Back in Black

episodes.synopsis: When Miguel learns Robby's identity, Johnny opens up about his failures as a father. To recruit students, Daniel stages a demonstration at a festival.
episodes.title: Fire and Ice

episodes.synopsis: Daniel tries to promote Miyagi-Do again, but Cobra Kai steals the spotlight. Johnny suspects Kreese is exaggerating his past accomplishments.
episodes.title: The Moment of Truth

episodes.synopsis: After Eli picks a fight with Demetri at the mall, Daniel works to help Demetri build his confidence. Johnny discovers that Robby is living with Daniel.
episodes.title: All In

episodes.synopsis: Daniel's new pupils learn how to settle their differences. While Johnny enjoys a road trip with old pals, Kreese undermines him at the dojo.
episodes.title: Take a Right

episodes.synopsis: Both senseis try unusual training techniques, and Johnny learns what Kreese has been teaching. Daniel's passion for Miyagi-Do jeopardizes his business.
episodes.title: Lull

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Robby's secret romance heats up while Daniel's relationship with Amanda remains frosty. Johnny tries a dating app.
episodes.title: Glory of Love

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Daniel run into each other at a restaurant and call an unexpected truce. Meanwhile, tensions between their students flare at a party.
episodes.title: Pulpo

episodes.synopsis: On the first day of school, the grudge between Tory and Sam explodes into a brawl between karate factions in the halls of West Valley High.
episodes.title: No Mercy

episodes.synopsis: Miguel's fighting for his life, Robby's missing, and Daniel and Johnny's reputations are in tatters as the community reacts to the West Valley brawl.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Johnny team up to find Robby. Miguel faces an uncertain future. Kreese tries to bring Tory back to Cobra Kai.
episodes.title: Nature Vs. Nurture

episodes.synopsis: Daniel's tarnished public image takes a toll on his sales, leading to a takeover offer. Johnny tries to raise money for Miguel's surgery.
episodes.title: Now Youâ€™re Gonna Pay

episodes.synopsis: Following an important meeting in Japan, Daniel revisits Mr. Miyagi's hometown on Okinawa. Johnny attempts to reconnect with Robby.
episodes.title: The Right Path

episodes.synopsis: In Okinawa, Daniel spends time with an old friend â€” and an old enemy, who has much to teach him. The dueling dojos' rivalry comes to a nasty head.
episodes.title: Miyagi-Do

episodes.synopsis: Miguel helps Johnny craft the perfect social media message. Kreese scouts new recruits while Daniel and Amanda try to shut down Cobra Kai.
episodes.title: King Cobra

episodes.synopsis: Daniel spends some father-daughter time with a traumatized Sam. Johnny plans to form a new karate dojo but struggles to come up with a cool name.
episodes.title: ObstÃ¡culos

episodes.synopsis: Informed that this year's All Valley Karate Tournament is being canceled, the three competing sensei attend a city council meeting to save it.
episodes.title: The Good, The Bad, and The Badass

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmastime in the Valley, and romance is in the air. Daniel and Miguel find unexpected common ground, and the Cobra Kai recruits go on a mission.
episodes.title: Feel the Night

episodes.synopsis: Old wounds begin to heal at a country club holiday party, but a brutal assault by Kreese's students leads to new betrayals and alliances.
episodes.title: December 19
